content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Answer all parts of the question that follows.a) Identify ONE way in which the adoption of free-market economic policies in the late twentieth century changed global trade.b) Explain ONE difference in the way in which the adoption of free-market economic policies in the late twentieth century affected economies in two different regions.c) Explain ONE reason why many states adopted free-market economic policies in the late twentieth century.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
